org.sakaiproject.portal.charon.handlers

Class BasePortalHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.portal.charon.handlers.BasePortalHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortalHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomHandler, DirectToolHandler, ErrorDoneHandler, ErrorReportHandler, GalleryResetHandler, HelpHandler, LoginHandler, LogoutHandler, OpmlHandler, PageHandler, PresenceHandler, ReLoginHandler, RoleSwitchHandler, RoleSwitchOutHandler, RssHandler, SiteResetHandler, StaticHandler, TimeoutDialogHandler, ToolHandler, ToolResetHandler, WorksiteResetHandler, XLoginHandler

    public abstract class BasePortalHandler
extends Object
implements PortalHandler
    Abstract class to hold common base methods for portal handlers.

    Sakai 2.4
